summary:
Adds 8 NEW two-handed Swords based on the Zamorak, Saradomin, Bandos & Armadyl Godswords from Runescape.

Each version comes with two models and are available in 4k, 2k and 1k Resolutions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url] 
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8PwWo6p.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/id4tPXe.png[/img][/center][b]
[center][youtube]W6yvcs3xwt8[/youtube] [youtube]i15jszDgINk[/youtube][/center][/b][b][b]

[/b]About:
[/b]
The Godswords of Gielinor are a collection of two-handed swords based on the Zamorak, Saradomin, Bandos & Armadyl Godswords from Runescape. Ever since I had made the Saradomin Godsword back in 2013, I have been asked to create the others but never got around to it. During that time, Jagex, the owners of Runescape updated the models of the swords to give them unique appearances. Many fans of Runescape prefer the older versions and some like the newer ones, so I decided to make both sets for people to enjoy.

Each model has unique textures and comes in 4k, 2k and 1k Resolutions. Appearance varies based on ENB Preset & Game Settings. You don't have to like Runescape to use them! 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] 

[b]Zamorak Godswords[/b]
[color=#999999]Successful Power Attacks have a 100% chance to trigger [/color][b]Ice Cleave[/b][color=#999999], which freezes multiple Enemies solid for 10 seconds.[/color]

[b]Saradomin Godswords[/b]
[color=#999999]Successful Power Attacks have a 100% chance to trigger [/color][b]Healing Blade[/b][color=#999999], which restores 75 Health to the Player.[/color]

[b]Bandos Godswords[/b]
[color=#999999]Successful Power Attacks have a 20% chance to trigger [/color][b]Warstrike[/b][color=#999999], which for 25 seconds increases damage by 100% and reduces the Armor Rating of Enemies.[/color]

[b]Armadyl Godswords[/b]
[color=#999999]Regular Attacks have a 5% chance to trigger [/color][b]Armadyl's Judgement[/b][color=#999999], which for 10 seconds Increases Attack & Attack Speed by 50%.[/color]

Each sword has a base stat of [b]25[/b], which is +1 higher than Daedric. They can be tempered at the Grindstone and upgraded to the newer model under the Steel Category of the Forge. They can also be changed back into the preview model by re-smithing.

[color=#ff0000][b][center]Do NOT optimize the textures! Some maps are purposely uncompressed![/center]
[/b][/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

To the North of Whiterun is a place called [b]Whitewatch Tower[/b]. Within the grounds of this area is a trap door, which leads to Gielinor's Tomb. You will need to navigate through the short tomb of Gielinor and solve a minor puzzle or two. A few enemies may stand in your way. Take Lydia, she'll look after you :)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files:

Godswords - Johnskyrim.esp
Godswords - Johnskyrim.bsa

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:

[/b]Q. Why are the Godswords under the Steel Smithing Category?
A. This was done to give everyone the opportunity to use them, without needing Daedric Smithing.

Q. I don't like the updated model, can I change it back?
A. Yes, take it to the Forge and use the new model to forge the old.

Q. Why are the gems missing from the Saradomin Godswords blade?
A. I felt they looked out of place, so I didn't include them.

Q. Are the Refined versions better?
A. No, they have the exact same stats and effects. It's purely visual for preference.

Q. Can you make this do this?
A. No, I'm tired and need to play Witcher 3 :D

Q. What mods are you working on?
A. Those are posted on my [url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][b]facebook[/b][/url] page!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- Sometimes the Guardians don't spawn exactly where I set them. Annoying.
- "Ice Cleave" from the Zamorak Godsword sometimes misses, this is just due to positioning.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim]
[/url][center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/F9p2o48.png[/img]

files.name: Refined Armadyl Godsword Fix
files.changelogHtml: Refined Armadyl Godsword no longer incorrectly emits "light", which made it too bright.
